Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [Comparison on HPLC analysis of aerial part of Bupleurums from different germplasm resources].

AbstractText: To investigate ingredient differences of the aerial part of Bupleurums from different germplasm resources by HPLC.
Twenty-one different germplasm resources were sown and cultured at the same conditions and the aerial parts of the biennial plants were analyzed by HPLC.

The chromatograms were established and the data were analyzed by Hierarchical Cluster Analysis to compare the similarity of the samples. The results showed that ingredients from various germplasm resources were significantly different, which indicated the germplasm diversity of Bupleurum.
The method can be used for comparison of the ingredient differences and quality control, the results provide important references for classification of Bupleurum species.
